deleteInvisibilityPowerUp() - Method in class bomberMan.gamePlay.Controller.GameBoardController

desactivateDetonator() - Method in class bomberMan.gamePlay.Model.Bomb
This method desactivates the detonator of a bomb that is going to be detonated by the bomberman.
DestroyBomb - Class in bomberMan.gamePlay.Controller
This class implements a thread for always checking if there are bombs in the game board and detonating them, as well as for verifying if the bomberman has the invisibility power up and deleting this power up once the delay of possession of this power up expires.
DestroyBomb(GameBoard, GameBoardController) - Constructor for class bomberMan.gamePlay.Controller.DestroyBomb
Constructor of the DestroyBomb class.
destroyBombsAround(int, int) - Method in class bomberMan.gamePlay.Controller.GameBoardController
This functions allows to destroy bombs that are in a bomb's range of explosion given the tile(i,j) on the game board.
DestroyBombTest - Class in gamePlayControllerTests

destroyBricks(int, int) - Method in class bomberMan.gamePlay.Controller.GameBoardController
This functions destroy bricks, if for (i,j) tile on the gameboard, a brick is in the bomb's range given by the cells at (i+BombRange, j), (i-Bombrange, j) (i, j+BombRange), (i, j-Bombrange)
destroyEnemies(int, int) - Method in class bomberMan.gamePlay.Controller.GameBoardController
This functions destroy an enemy, if for (i,j) tile on the gameboard, an enemy is in the bomb's range given by the cells at (i+BombRange, j), (i-Bombrange, j) (i, j+BombRange), (i, j-Bombrange)
detonateOldestBomb() - Method in class bomberMan.gamePlay.Controller.GameBoardController
Detonates the oldest bomb that the bomberman dropped which has a detonator.
detonateRegularBombs() - Method in class bomberMan.gamePlay.Controller.GameBoardController
* This functions detonates bombs that don't have a detonator.
